sections.title: Our Promise to You
content: Your trust is our most important asset. This policy explains what information we collect, why we need it, and how we protect it. We keep things simple and clear, so you always know what's happening with your data.

sections.title: Information We Collect
content: To make your GenRwin experience seamless, we collect a few necessary details:

list_items.title: Your Profile:
list_items.subtitle: Name and email to create and secure your account.

list_items.title: Reward Payouts:
list_items.subtitle: Payment details so we can send you the rewards you've earned.

list_items.title: App Activity:
list_items.subtitle: Info on tasks completed. This helps us fix bugs and make the app even better.

sections.title: Your Data is Never for Sale
content: Let's be clear: we **never sell** your personal information. We only share it with trusted partners, like payment processors, who are legally bound to keep your data safe while helping us deliver your rewards.
